name: Fruity Lips - Endless 2d Runner
description:
Fruit are healthy! Eat as much as you can and don't let them get away in Fruity Lips 2D. Catch the Super Fruit and avoid eating the Poisoned ones!

Game Features:

😋👄
🔸 Endless Runner Fun in health Fruit style!
🔸 Colourful HD environment depending on your score!
🔸 Many Fruit with extra points!
🔸 Extra Powers from Super Fruit!
🔸 Funny Sounds for more exciting gameplay!
🔸 Poisoned Fruit to reveal your true skills!
🔸 Increasing difficulty over time!
🔸 Fast application to run at any time!
😋👄
